sn48.14:4.3: The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, samādhi, and wisdom.
sn48.14:4.6: Someone who has completed and fulfilled these five faculties is a perfected one. If they are weaker than that, they’re a non-returner … a once-returner … a stream enterer … a follower of principle … a follower by faith.
sn48.14:4.7: So, mendicants, if you practice partially you succeed partially. If you practice fully you succeed fully.
sn48.14:4.8: These five faculties are not a waste, I say.”
